snippet.title: Operation Lone Wolf® Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Operation Lone Wolf is a multiplayer first person shooter, set in the second world war. The game focuses on different free for all gamemodes. It's a fast paced, arcade shooter, in which having fun is the main goal. Upgrade your weapons, choose your perks, and get out on the battlefield!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/926010/Operation_Lone_Wolf/
Website: https://www.operationlonewolf.ga/
Discord: https://discord.gg/4Fe3my9
Music: https://www.youtube.com/c/NCMEpicMusic
